faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: Go to 'My Orders' → Select your order → Track to see live updates.

faqs.question: Can I modify an order after placing it?
faqs.answer: You can modify items only within the order buffer time before packing starts.

faqs.question: What if an item is out of stock?
faqs.answer: You’ll be notified during checkout and can choose a replacement or cancel the item.

faqs.question: Do products come with a warranty?
faqs.answer: Some items have warranties. Check the product details before purchase.

faqs.question: How do I know if a product is fresh?
faqs.answer: We source fresh items daily. Check packaging dates and expiry information in the app.
